A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horribly disappointed. The humor was cheap and completely incongruous with Star Wars. The dialogue was completely out of step with the characters. Poe's character was completely neutered. The whole Finn storyline was a complete waste of screen time\, as it added nothing to the main plot - he could have never left the main fleet and the end result to the story would be completely unaffected. Like deserved such a better storyline and character arc - they diminished him to nothing essentially. And that ending... these professional critics are smoking some strong stuff with their rave reviews\, because this movie was a nightmare.
